ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] A question for you all
ygData.msgSnippet: They will be there, if it s been just three months then you can have your toons back. Luis JUst use the same login name and password that you have when you
ygData.messageBody:
They will be there, if it's been just three months
then you can have your toons back.

Luis

JUst use the same login name and password that you
have when you canceled your account.



--- "John Russo <john_russo2000@...>"
<john_russo2000@...> wrote:
> It has been well over 3 months that I cancled the
> account. Could
> they still be there? That would be good!!!
>
> John Russo
>
>
>

> Binnier
